thumb.title: The Courage to Lead Podcast by Coach Harlan. The grit to build a sales team with Richard Blank
thumb.description: "The Courage to Lead" is a podcast hosted by business and leadership coach Harlan Hammack. In the podcast, Harlan interviews entrepreneurs, authors, speakers, and industry leaders about their experiences with risk, resilience, and leadership. The podcast aims to provide listeners with practical advice and inspiration to step up and lead with courage. Coach Harlan and iB4e Coaching delivers Business and Leadership Coaching for executives, entrepreneurs, and small business professionals. Richard Blank – Ep 270: Courage to Build Culture, Not Just a CompanyAt just 27, Richard Blank took a leap that would shape the rest of his life — relocating to Costa Rica to train over 5,000 employees at one of San Jose’s largest call centers. That bold move sparked a journey filled with unexpected turns, cultural challenges, and remarkable growth.https://youtu.be/D_Jy0Bz7kDkhttps://youtu.be/AUSbOZuh-DYhttps://youtu.be/3Bydcm_tVsMhttps://youtu.be/W0KRvjAIfUkhttps://youtu.be/Ab3NDs-ZJ6U
